sprint_goal: Establish the service foundation, database schema with PostGIS, and a fully automated CI/CD pipeline.
epic_coverage: Foundational Service Setup & Deployment, User Profile & Data Management, Observability and Monitoring
key_deliverables: Initialized NestJS service; Automated CI/CD pipeline to EKS; Database schema with PostGIS enabled; Structured logging.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a successful automated deployment to staging via a pull request merge. Show the running 'hello world' service in EKS. Show structured logs in CloudWatch.
success_criteria: 100% of pipeline runs for main branch are successful. Staging environment is stable. Database schema is fully migrated.
risk_factors: Complexity of IAM/OIDC configuration for GitHub Actions to AWS deployment. RDS connectivity issues due to VPC/security group misconfiguration.
mitigation_strategies: Follow AWS documentation for OIDC closely and test in an isolated environment. Provide clear documentation for local DB setup and AWS firewall rules.
external_dependencies: AWS EKS Cluster, AWS RDS Instance, AWS ECR Registry must be provisioned.
integration_windows: Integration testing of CI/CD pipeline from day 5 onwards.
burndown_target: Complete foundational tasks by day 6 to allow for full pipeline testing.

sprint_goal: Deliver all administrative user management features, compliance workflows, and full service observability.
epic_coverage: User Authentication & Session Management, User Profile & Data Management, Administrator Capabilities, Compliance & Data Governance, Observability and Monitoring
key_deliverables: Complete user registration and login flow; Admin APIs for user management; Audit trail; DPDP compliance features (consent, erasure); Metrics and Tracing.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate customer registration. Demonstrate admin login and viewing the user list. Show an audit log entry after an admin action. Demonstrate the 'Right to Erasure' anonymization process.
success_criteria: All authentication endpoints are secure and performant. Admin capabilities are functional and protected by RBAC. Compliance features are implemented and tested.
risk_factors: Data inconsistency between PostgreSQL and AWS Cognito during user creation/modification. Incomplete PII anonymization in the 'Right to Erasure' feature.
mitigation_strategies: Implement Saga pattern for distributed transactions. Create a comprehensive data map of all PII fields and conduct thorough manual data verification.
external_dependencies: AWS Cognito User Pool, AWS SNS, Prometheus, Jaeger/X-Ray.
integration_windows: Continuous integration testing of all new API endpoints.
burndown_target: Complete core authentication stories by day 5 to unblock admin and compliance features.
